title: 82 - The MFM/Unqualified with Anna Faris Crossover Special Pt. 1
description: In part one of the My Favorite Murder/Unqualified crossover special, Karen covers the BTK Killer, Anna quizzes Karen and Georgia on relationship dealbreakers, and they all give advice to a call-in listener.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
